hooks.command: f=$(jq -r '.tool_input.file_path'); case "$f" in *.ts|*.tsx) bunx biome check "$f" 2>/dev/null;; *.py) ruff check "$f" 2>/dev/null;; esac; true

for f in $(git diff --name-only 2>/dev/null); do case "$f" in *.ts|*.tsx) bunx biome check --write "$f" 2>/dev/null;; *.py) ruff check --fix "$f" 2>/dev/null; ruff format "$f" 2>/dev/null;; esac; done; notify-send 'Claude' 'Done' 2>/dev/null || true
